resources.string: Access to the location service is required to show your current location on the map.
This app requires location permission to use current location as the start or end location.
Location permission is required for this app.
Cannot use same start location and destination
"Routes were not found with the current travel mode.\nPlease try again with different locations"
T"he requesting account has exceeded its daily quota.\nPlease try again tomorrow."
"The requesting account has exceeded its short-term quota.\nPlease try again a few minutes later."
"An error has occurred.\nPlease try again a few minutes later."
